p: HeLa cells grown in 96-well plates were transfected with the indicated pair of VN- and VC-tagged constructs by using Lipofectamine LTX and Plus reagents. pCAGGS-VN/pCAGGS-VC was used as a negative control ( 69). At 36 h posttransfection, cells were fixed with 4% PFA for 30 min and then incubated with Hoechst 33342 to stain the nuclei. Images were captured by using the Operetta high-content imaging system.
